footer-desc: Mr. Mohammed Majid Al-Hajri, the lawyer and legal expert, established the office in 2011.
home-2nd-section-body-desc-sec-1: Mohammed Majid Al Hajri Advocates, Legal Consultants and Arbitration Office.
home-2nd-section-body-desc-sec-2: Mr. Mohammed Majid Al-Hajri, the lawyer and legal expert, established the office in 2011.
home-2nd-section-body-desc-sec-3: The office comprises a group of distinguished consultants andlawyers of different nationalities, and they have legal backgrounds and very great experience in the field of law. They exert their efforts to provide the best legal services for everyone. And with the lowest possible fees and meeting the advanced needs in the field of legal services for the Qatari community on the one hand and all residents of the State of Qatar on the other hand.
home-2nd-section-body-desc-sec-4: They keep pace with the global development through social networking sites to provide better services to our customers outside the State of Qatar, and in order to fulfil the requirements of our local and international customers all over the world.
office-desc: Mr. Mohammed Majid Al-Hajri, the lawyer and legal expert, established the office in 2011.
who-we-are-desc: Mohammed Majid Al Hajri Advocates, Legal Consultants and Arbitration Office. Mr. Mohammed Majid Al-Hajri, the lawyer and legal expert, established the office in 2011. The office comprises a group of distinguished consultants and lawyers of different nationalities, and they have legal backgrounds and very great experience in the field of law. They exert their efforts to provide the best legal services for everyone. And with the lowest possible fees and meeting the advanced needs in the field of legal services for the Qatari community on the one hand and all residents of the State of Qatar on the other hand. They keep pace with the global development through social networking sites to provide better services to our customers outside the State of Qatar, and in order to fulfil the requirements of our local and international customers all over the world.
we-can-deal-with-anyone-desc: In our office, the lawyers can speak several languages so they can deal and understand anyone’s problem.
speech-1: At the beginning, we are all working in a state of legal institutions under the banner of His Highness the Emir, Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani, who laid the foundations for the state of law and legislation in Qatar.
speech-2: So we established the office in 2011 and it turns to be one of the most important legal institutions within the State of Qatar - a matter that went beyond many countries, especially the GCC countries, Egypt, Sudan, Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan, UK, France, Turkey and Italy.
speech-3: The office contributed to enrich the legal culture by spreading legal awareness among all its clients and providing legal advice aimed at protecting their private and public interests.
speech-4: We also give our clients a high level of attention according to our unique standards, which qualify us to provide the best legal and technical services regarding all lawsuits and its legal procedures, and enlightening them to whatever comes new, that is through a program specially designed for our office.
speech-5: Our presence at the local and international levels has acquired us knowledge and experience in environmental, social and economic legal matters.
speech-6: We are proud of our vision that aimed to build an integrated legal institution including the highest competencies and experiences in various legal disciplines.
our-goal-desc: “We strive to provide the best legal services to our clients by balancing the legal risks, the interest of the client and the cost of the legal service, and assisting the client in choosing the appropriate legal means to resolve disputes with our relentless pursuit to improve the quality of services and develop the efficiency of performance”
our-vision-desc: “Our vision is to build an integrated legal institution that includes the highest competencies and experiences in various legal disciplines.”
contact-us-info-desc: We love to hear from you. Our friendly team is always here to chat.
send-to-us-item-desc: Our friendly team is here for help.
office-item-desc: Come say hello at our office.
contact-us-desc: You can reach us anytime via
